definitions.definition: The act by which something is posed.
The act of one who poses or postures.
The act of portraying oneself artificially, usually to make oneself appear grander or to fit in with the crowd; pretense

main_definition: The act by which something is posed.
secondary_definitions: The act of one who poses or postures.
( informal ) The act of portraying oneself artificially, usually to make oneself appear grander or to fit in with the crowd; pretense
